description: An IIT Delhi-incubated educational startup focused on nurturing innovative mindsets in children through activity-based, play-learn curricula and DIY kits.

founders: B. Tech (Engineering Physics) alumni of IIT Delhi
location: 5-C-1, Tower C, R&I Park, IIT Delhi, Hauz Khas-110016, New Delhi, India

description: An IIT Delhi-incubated startup specializing in retrofitting vintage and classic internal combustion engine (ICE) vehicles into electric vehicles (EVs), aiming to promote sustainable mobility without adding new vehicles to the road.

description: An IIT Delhi-incubated startup developing high-performance electric powertrains, including motors and controllers, for light electric vehicles such as two-wheelers and three-wheelers. The company focuses on indigenous designs tailored for Indian driving conditions, aiming to reduce import dependency and promote sustainable mobility.
location: D-171, Sector 10, Noida, Gautam Buddha Nagar, Uttar Pradesh – 201301, India

description: An IIT Delhi-incubated startup developing magnetic resonance-based wireless charging technology for electric vehicles, enabling 30% faster charging compared to conventional methods.

description: A consumer EV startup aiming to design, develop, and manufacture micro-electric vehicles for urban commutes.

description: Asvin Tech Biodent is an Indian startup specializing in AI-powered dental technology. Their flagship product, Dentra, is a cost-effective and scalable intraoral 3D scanner designed to streamline dental workflows and enhance diagnostic accuracy.
location: IIT Delhi, Hauz Khas, New Delhi – 110016, India

description: Raised Lines Foundation (RLF) is a non-profit organization incubated at IIT Delhi, dedicated to making education accessible and inclusive for visually impaired students. RLF designs and produces tactile educational resources, including textbooks with tactile diagrams, STEM kits, and digital accessibility solutions, to empower students with visual disabilities to pursue STEM education.
location: IIT Delhi, Hauz Khas, New Delhi – 110016, India

description: Medicfibers is an IIT Delhi-incubated startup specializing in antiviral, antimicrobial, antifungal, and antibacterial textile solutions. Their flagship product, Viroclog, is an eco-friendly, biodegradable, odorless, and colorless chemical solution that, when applied to fabrics, imparts long-lasting protection against infections. Viroclog-treated textiles remain effective for up to 125 washes, making them suitable for hospital linens, uniforms, surgical gowns, and other medical textiles.
location: IIT Delhi, Hauz Khas, New Delhi – 110016, India

description: TranscribeGlass is an innovative assistive technology startup that has developed real-time speech-to-text glasses. Designed to enhance communication for individuals who are Deaf or hard of hearing, these glasses display live captions directly in the user's field of vision, enabling them to follow conversations seamlessly.
location: IIT Delhi, Hauz Khas, New Delhi – 110016, India

description: Provides patient-matching medical devices like implants, cutting guides, and organ models using cutting-edge 3D technology.
location: A-4 second floor, IIT Delhi, Hauz Khas, New Delhi – 110016, India

description: Care Formulation Labs Pvt. Ltd. is a pharmaceutical company engaged in the manufacturing, distribution, and export of a wide range of medicines. Their product portfolio includes over 350 formulations across various therapeutic categories such as anti-bacterial, analgesics, anti-malarial, anti-psychotics, anti-asthmatic, diuretics, tranquilizers, anti-inflammatory, herbal, ophthalmic, and more. The company is committed to delivering quality healthcare solutions both in India and internationally.
location: IIT Delhi, Hauz Khas, New Delhi – 110016, India

description: Develops equipment for efficient utilization of renewable and non-conventional energy resources, focusing on photovoltaic-based sources.
location: IIT Delhi, Hauz Khas, New Delhi – 110016, India

companyName: Nable IT Consultancy Services Private Limited
description: Nable IT is a Delhi-based AI and ML startup specializing in computer vision, predictive analytics, and IT consulting. The company offers a range of AI-driven solutions, including facial recognition systems, video analytics, and predictive tools tailored for industries such as automotive, manufacturing, logistics, and education.
location: IIT Delhi, Hauz Khas, New Delhi – 110016, India

description: An HR technology startup providing technology-based skill match and skill development solutions to help companies find and retain frontline talent.
location: IIT Delhi, Hauz Khas, New Delhi – 110016, India

description: INRM Consultants is a research-driven environmental consultancy specializing in integrated solutions for water resources, climate resilience, urban systems, and geospatial analytics. Incubated at IIT Delhi in 2001, the company offers services including flood forecasting, climate vulnerability assessments, hydrological modeling, and precision agriculture tools, serving governments, international agencies, and NGOs.
location: 5-B-2, R&I Park, IIT Delhi, Hauz Khas, New Delhi – 110016, India
